ygData.subject: RE: Thank you Aarkon.
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a couple questions about the island... I m almost 12 (on a new server) and was thinking about checking it out. I know there are some high level sisters
ygData.messageBody:
I have a couple questions about the island... I'm almost 12 (on a new
server) and was thinking about checking it out.

I know there are some high level sisters (red to my old char at 17)... do
you have to worry about them wandering by? The one I know I saw was
standing out in the water a little ways from the island.

Where is a good place to hunt on the island? I've never really been there
(seen it from the boat many times) and since I believe they will be agro to
my DE Necro (they are wood elves) I won't be able to really explore.

Any other general advise/tips about the island?

The darkness be with you,
Azerin now of Brell

-----Original Message-----
> Aarkon,
> I read your post the other day about being able to
> handle Sister Isle from level 12+. Being level 12
> myself I decided to try it last night. I'm now
> level 13 and having a blast. Thank you.
>
> -Haytred
>
